1420 :       subroutine vom_write_hourly ()
1421 :       use vegwatmod
1422 :       use vegmod
1423 :       use watmod
1424 :       
1425 :       implicit none
1426 : 
1427 :       CHARACTER(60) :: hourlyformat
1428 :       CHARACTER(3)  :: str
1429 : 
1430 :       if (year(d___) .ge. firstyear .and. year(d___) .le. lastyear) then
1431 : !       * internal write to convert from number to string
1432 :         write(str,'(i3)') nlayers_
1433 : !       * includes a column for each sublayer
1434 :         hourlyformat = '(i6,i6,i4,i7,i5,'//str//'e14.6)'
1435 :         write(kfile_resultshourly,'(i6,i7,i7,i7,i7,24e15.5)') year(d___), &
1436 :      &    month(d___), day(d___), d___, h__, rain_, tair, par_, vd__,  &
1437 :      &    hesoil, pc_ + pcg_(2), jmax25_(2), jmax25g(2), mq_,          &
1438 :      &    rl__(2) + rlg__(2,2), lambda_, lambdag, rr_ + rrg, hass_(2), &
1439 :      &    hassg(2,2), hetm_, hetmg, suvec_(1), ys_, wsnew_,            &
1440 :      &    hspgfcf, hinfx
1441 :         write(kfile_delyuhourly,hourlyformat) year(d___), month(d___),  &
1442 :      &    day(d___), d___, h__, delzvec(1:nlayers_)
1443 :         write(kfile_ruptkhourly,hourlyformat) year(d___), month(d___), &
1444 :      &    day(d___), d___, h__, hruptkvec(1:nlayers_)
1445 :         write(kfile_suvechourly,hourlyformat) year(d___), month(d___), &
1446 :      &    day(d___), d___, h__, suvec_(1:nlayers_)
1447 :       endif
1448 : 
1449 :       return
1450 :       end subroutine vom_write_hourly
